questions.question_text_1:
If (234)a = (143)b, where a and b are the bases of the respective numbers, what are the values of a
and b?
question_texts:

and b?

questions.question_text_1: Given that NOT, 2-input AND/OR gates have delays of 1 ns, what will be the maximum delay of a 3x8 Decoder circuit? Note: if the answer is 1 ns, write 1.
